data.actual_result: The slider background is in the correct color, but the circle is also gray, which not only makes it look odd but also makes it inconsistent with other sliders
data.expected_result: As other sliders (like in Voice & Video settings for instance), the slider should have gray background and the circle should be white
data.short_description: Slowmode slider has an odd color on Light theme
data.steps_to_repro: - Use Light theme - Go to channel settings - Scroll down to see the slowmode slider
